module.name: default
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=powerpc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux11*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," LIBS="-lpthread" ;; *-hpux10*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," LIBS="-lpthread" ;; *-irix*) CFLAGS="-O2" CXXFLAGS="-O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
_libglib_lib=${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB} _aspell_lib=${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB} _libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
if [ "${SB_VAR_ASPELL+set}" = set ]; then _aspell_lib=${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB} fi _libglib_lib=${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB} _libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ev5" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
# defining _BSD to get a flock decl might have side fx... export ac_cv_func_flock=no ;; i?86*-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4"
CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+-L${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_GCC_RT_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+-L${_aspell_lib:-"${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB}/${_gccsubdir}"}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" LIBS="${LIBS+${LIBS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+:${_libglib_lib:-${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}}/${_gccsubdir}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_DBUS+:${SB_VAR_DBUS_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --disable-myspell --disable-uspell --disable-hspell \ ${SB_VAR_ISPELL+--with-ispell-dir="${SB_VAR_ISPELL}/lib"} \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+--with-aspell-prefix=${SB_VAR_ASPELL}} \ ${SB_VAR_ASPELL+--with-aspell-lib=${_aspell_lib:-"${SB_VAR_ASPELL_LIB}/${_gccsubdir}"}} \ $(test "${SB_VAR_DBUS+set}" != set && echo --disable-zemberek) \ --libdir=${_libdir:-"${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gccsubdir}"} \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" enchant.pc
module.install:
gmake install
# We must remove -pthread from the .la file. case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-linux*) ;; *) ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e 's|-pthread||g' \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gccsubdir}/libenchant.la ;; esac

module.name: pyenchant-2.7.2
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in hppa*-hpux*) SO=sl ;; *) SO=so ;; esac
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s|@libenchant@|${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}/${_gccsubdir}/libenchant.${SO}|" \ enchant/_enchant.py
module.install:
${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/python setup.py install \ --single-version-externally-managed --root=/ \ --install-lib=${_install_prefix} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
# install path for Python's include.paths.d ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d \ ${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d cat >${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d/99-${SB_PROG_NAME} <<_EOT_ ${_install_prefix} _EOT_

gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" enchant.pc
module.install: gmake install-pkgconfigDATA gmake -C src install-libLTLIBRARIES gmake -C src/aspell install-aspellLTLIBRARIES gmake -C src/ispell install-ispellLTLIBRARIES

item.para: Fix bug 12567: the ispell sources aren't licensed under the LGPL
Add a function to get enchant's version (enchant_get_version)
Disable zemberek plugin by default, as it's known to cause issues/crashes with WebKit
Fix bug 12472: Win32 DLL dependency not found popup occurs when module has unmet dependencies
Fix bug 12409: Registry handle not closed in enchant_get_registry_value_ex
Fix bug 12406: Leak in _enchant_get_user_home_dirs() on Windows
Fix bug 12305: Zemberek module lists a Turkish dictionary even without Zemberek installed
Don't assert if passed a null string list
Fix bug 12350: enchant_pwl_init_with_file truncates pwl file
Fix a double-free memory corruption bug
Fix bug 12173: fix some small memory leaks
Fix bug 12174: mis-acceptence of dictionaries which start with a partial match of the lang id
Fix bug 12160: enchant 1.5.0 always looks in "lib" dir for plugins
Fix the build with the MSVC compiler
Compare paths ignoring case sensitivity on windows
